title: Access to electricity (% of population)
name: eg.elc.accs.zs
readme: Access to electricity is the percentage of population with access to electricity. Electrification data are collected from industry, national surveys and international sources.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Access to electricity is the percentage of population with access to electricity. Electrification data are collected from industry, national surveys and international sources.
